body.name: 4-Inch Dual Layer Memory Foam Office Chair Cushion for Back Pain Relief and Support
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery February 26 - 28 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EXTRA THICK & STRONG SUPPORT - BUFORT seat cushion offers extra thick and strong support with its double-layer memory foam design. It measures 17"x 16"x 4", making it thicker than other chair cushions. This ensures the most suitable firmness and support for your office chair. With greater depth provides enhanced comfort and support, making it the perfect solution for those who spend a lot of time sitting.

RELIEVE BACK PAIN & SCIATICA - If you suffer from back pain or sciatica, you may find relief with our memory foam seat cushion. The office chair cushion castellated structure and ergonomic curve help to distribute pressure and support your body, alleviating pain in your back, buttocks, tailbone, and sciatic nerve. Use this chair pad to improve your sitting posture and overall comfort.

MULTIPLE USES CUSHIONS - This dual-layer seat cushion serves multiple purposes, providing both comfort and support. It is a great addition to any office chair, home desk chair, car seat, gaming chair, mobility scooter, automotive seat, or wheelchair. The extra thick design makes it an ideal booster seat for use in cars, and it is also suitable for travel, sporting events, or women during pregnancy.

EASY TO CARRY & MAINTAIN - This chair pad is designed for easy portability and maintenance. The built-in carrying handle makes it convenient to take it anywhere you go. The removable cover is machine washable, and the dust cloth cover prvotects the foam from dust and dirt. The non-slip rubber bottom keeps the car cushion firmly in place on different chairs and surfaces.

UNIQUE GIFTS FOR MEN & WOMEN：For the people you care about, the specially upgraded dual-layer memory foam seat cushion is a great way to relieve back and tailbone pain and improve bad posture. This chair cushion is an excellent gift for office workers and anyone who sitting. Do not hesitate to send them the pain-relief memory foam seat cushion on birthday, Thanksgiving, Christmas.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Breathable Fabric Convenient Carrying Handle Anti-slip Cloth Cover

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars other reviews said it was too small, but for me it was a perfect size
reviews.reviewText: Bought this because I had developed some back pain and sit on a hard surface at my desk. This is really comfortable and appears well made and sturdy. Would definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and thick!
reviews.reviewText: I needed to lift my seating position at the computer--the chair doesn't move high enough, but this cushion did the job! A good combination of firm but comfy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars four inches, soft, easy on the butt
reviews.reviewText: I like the pillow for its comfort. but, I found it to be too thick for me to sit on. Being short. I had a hard time getting on the pillow while trying to get in our Jeep. It does have the separation in the front for your legs to be a little lower. It has a carrying handle on it which makes it easy to take anywhere. Soft on the butt. I don't like that it is 4 inches all the way around. It made it hard for me to touch the floor with my feet. Seems to keep its shape. It did take about a day and a half to get it totally expanded. I would highly recommend this pillow if you were in a car where your getting in and out closer to the ground. it would work for me then. I am now using it on my office chair at home where I can lower the chair and it is great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Practical and looks good. Handle helps a lot.
reviews.reviewText: Cushion is very comfortable and I like the handle to place the pad on my wheelchair.Also it gives me a little height which helps as I am short.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought thus for sitting in the bleachers at my grandsons hockey games. Couldn't be more comfortable. Doesn't move nor slip. Everyone asks where I got it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not for people 6' tall.
reviews.reviewText: The size of 16" x 17" is quite small. I am 6' tall, 222 lbs. but I am not "wide" in my seat, I am narrow even. I hang off every side of this thing. I feel like I'm trying to balance on it and not just fall off. The manufactured depressions for your sitting side are tiny. It may be better suited to a much smaller person, perhaps best for a child. If you are a small person, It may be pretty good. If you are not, I wouldn't buy this product. It is not comfortable for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars large enough too fit my 400 lb chair
reviews.reviewText: nice memory foam thick will add 2inches too overall height,comfy has a handle i also use it in my kia soul

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My hubby is very skinny due to health issues. This cushion provides him such comfort. He loves it. Finally the sore on his tailbone is able to heal and not reopen when he sits down.
